About White

"What I cannot create I do not understand" - Feynman Richard

White is absolutely obsessed with Feynman—so much so that he chose Feynman as his avatar. He strives to present every complex concept in a straightforward, simple way. As a committed minimalist, he brings a passionate and curious spirit to life, immersing himself in reading and pursuing new experiences. Above all, White firmly believes no one has real limitations—time is the greatest lever of all. Don’t waste yours!

我很喜欢费曼，并且我也坚信最好的学习方式是通过实践和分享。在博客中我将分享我当前所感兴趣专注的任何内容，无论是技术也好，亦或是一些书籍或感想，内容不局限，形式不拘泥。

希望通过输出倒逼输入的形式，让我可以更专注我所感兴趣的任何东西，而不只是一知半解。

- White, 2025.7.21
